title: Hanes Men's Socks, X-Temp Cushioned No Show Socks, 12-Pack
description: HIGH-TECH, HIGH PERFORMANCE - Remarkable technologies are built into every pair.
X-TEMP TECHNOLOGY WITH COOL COMFORT FABRIC - Wicks away moisture to keep feet cool and dry during a rigorous workout or any busy day.
BYE, BYE STINKY FEET - FreshIQ advanced fighting technology keeps feet smelling fresh.
A BUILT-IN SUPPORT SYSTEM - Arch compression with spandex for a supportive, stretchy fit.
CUSHIONED COMFORT - Extra cushioning at the toe and heel softens impact with every step.
AIRY VENTILATED PANELS - To help your feet breathe all day.

Designed for the guy with an active lifestyle, these cushioned no-show socks from Hanes® are packed with performance features that treat your feet with comfort. These classic no show socks are made with X-Temp™ technology and Cool Comfort® fabric, teaming up to wick away moisture to keep feet cool and dry no matter how rigorous your workout or how stressful your day. Plus these high-performance no-show socks have FreshIQ™ advanced odor-fighting technology that keeps feet smelling fresh. These quality no-show socks have a reinforced toe and heel for enhanced wear and built-in arch compression with spandex for a supportive, stretchy fit. You'll appreciate the extra cushioning along the bottom for added impact comfort and the strategically placed ventilated panels that help your feet breathe. Smooth toe seams provide even more comfort. Stock up on these cooling no-show socks in a convenient 12-pack, ready to perform for work or play.
